snippet: A suicide car bomber struck on a busy road Sunday morning after apparently turning away from attacking Nigerian churches holding Easter services, killing at least 38 people.
abstract: Suicide car bomber strikes in Kaduna, Nigeria, killing at least 38 people in a huge blast that badly damages nearby churches during an Easter service; some fear that attack may further inflame tensions in a city that has long been at the center of religious, ethnic and political violence in the nation.
lead_paragraph: A suicide car bomber struck on a busy road Sunday morning after apparently turning away from attacking Nigerian churches holding Easter services, killing at least 38 people.

headline.seo: Suicide Bomb Attack in Divided Nigeria Damages 2 Churches
headline.main: Suicide Bombing Kills Dozens in Nigeria
headline.print_headline: 2 Churches Damaged by Nigeria Car Bomb
